metadata.name: MsiExec Web Install
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious msiexec process starts with web addresses as parameter

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' msiexec')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious msiexec process starts with web addresses as parameter

metadata.objective: False positive: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment Reference: https://blog.trendmicro.com/trendlabs-security-intelligence/attack-using-windows-installer-msiexec-exe-leads-lokibot/
